/* ConactUsMapper.selectConactUs */
select count(1) over() as total_count , row_number() over(order by conact_id desc ) as rnum , tb.* from ( select conact_id , conact_nm , conact_phone , conact_mail , conact_contents , conact_agree , DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_datetime from tb_conact_us where conact_id like concat(#{id},'%') )tb where 1 = 1
